T02D1286:140b-2: # // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1286:140b-3: dang po thod pa'am snod gang rung ba'i nang du /
T02D1286:140b-5: bsang nan dang bcas pa blugs la /
T02D1286:141a-1: bdag nyid lhag pa'i lhar bsgoms la /
T02D1286:141a-2: gtor ma'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi gdan la h'um mthing ga gcig bsam /
T02D1286:141a-3: de zhu ste gtor ma la thim pas /
T02D1286:141a-4: gtor ma'i rdzas kyi dngos po sbyangs par bsam mo //
T02D1286:141a-5: de nas yang padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng /
T02D1286:141a-7: de 'ong du zhu ste thim pas /
T02D1286:141a-8: kha dog dmar po la dangs shing dag la dri ma med pa /
T02D1286:141a-9: ro mchog dang ldan par bsgom /
T02D1286:141a-10: de nas yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du /
T02D1286:141a-12: de 'od du zhu ste thim pas /
T02D1286:141a-13: dkar la dang ba ro mchog brgya dang ldan pa'i bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du gyur par bsam mo //
T02D1286:141a-14: de nas bdud rtsi las 'od 'phros pas /
T02D1286:141a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi bdud rtsi dang /
T02D1286:141a-16: lha yul na yod pa'i bdud rtsi bkug ste /
T02D1286:141a-18: de nas bdud rtsi de nyid las yang 'od 'phros pas /
T02D1286:141a-19: bla ma dam pa dang bcas pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02D1286:141a-20: phyi nang gi chos skyong mkha' 'gro ma dang bcas pa nam mkha' la bkug la /
T02D1286:141a-21: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am a'a
T02D1286:141a-22: dya nutpanna tv'a ta aom a'a: h'um phat sv'a h'a
T02D1286:141a-23: / zhes brjod pas gtor ma las 'od 'phros pas so so'i lce la reg pas /
T02D1286:141a-24: bdud rtsi'i bde ba chen po'i ro stobs shing myong bar bsam mo //
T02D1286:141a-25: de nas chos bshad par bya ste /
T02D1286:141a-26: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste /
T02D1286:141a-27: zhes pa la sogs pa bya /
T02D1286:141a-28: mkha' 'gro ma rnams la ci 'dod pa'i las bcol lo //
T02D1286:141a-29: bzod gsol byas la gshegs su gsol /
